item.title: Runserver eror
item.dc:creator: @sp00nkitty sp00nkitty
item.description:
@sp00nkitty wrote:

[quote=“sora0145, post:1, topic:81536”]when i click start server not the 1 with the icons with the books it opens and closes quickly y?[/quote]i used to have the same error, here right click runserver.bat and delete everything in there and put this in there save and then try runserver.bat it shud work then:@echo off title Only The Best - Created by Sp00nkitty set java="C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\java.exe" "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\java" -Xmx500m server pause
